name: Parry
desc: (AttackBlock - Parry) Stops one damaging Offensive card used on you by another creature.

name: Block
desc: (AttackBlock - Block) Stops one damaging Offensive Card used on you by another creature. Delays your turn by 1.

name: Dodge
desc: (Dodge) Negates the effect of one Offensive Card, allows the Player to move to an adjacent tile.

name: Counterattack
desc: (Counterattack) Stops one attack card used on you by another creature, and allows you to instantly use an Offensive Card on the attacker. Pushes your Player token upwards by 2, regardless of your used card.
